p: More fit DENV strains have been proposed to pose increased risk of causing severe disease than less fit strains due to their propensity for higher replication in the human host ( Rico-Hesse, 2010). Viremia levels in patients have been associated with disease severity in several studies ( Avirutnan et al., 2006, Libraty et al., 2002b, Tricou et al., 2011).
